languages.text: Чемпион Хаоса может склониться перед Пределом рассвета или же сразить его, дабы заполучить древнее сокровище, в котором будет запечатан Великий демон. Выбор — за Вольным Торговцем.
The champion of Chaos can bow to the Edge of Daybreak, or defeat it to obtain an ancient treasure in which the Greater Daemon will be sealed. The choice is up to the Rogue Trader.
languages.original_text: Чемпион Хаоса может склониться перед Пределом рассвета или же сразить его, дабы заполучить древнее сокровище, в котором будет запечатан Великий демон. Выбор — за Вольным Торговцем.

traits.locale_text: The champion of Chaos can bow to the Edge of Daybreak, or defeat it to obtain an ancient treasure in which the Greater Daemon will be sealed. The choice is up to the Rogue Trader.
The champion of Chaos can bow to the Edge of Daybreak, or defeat it to obtain an ancient treasure in which the Greater Daemon will be sealed. The choice is up to the Rogue Trader.
The champion of Chaos can bow to the Edge of Daybreak, or defeat it to obtain an ancient treasure in which the Greater Daemon will be sealed. The choice is up to the Rogue Trader.
The champion of Chaos can bow to the Edge of Daybreak, or defeat it to obtain an ancient treasure in which the Greater Daemon will be sealed. The choice is up to the Rogue Trader.

languages.text: Der Champion des Chaos kann sich vor dem Rand des Tagesanbruchs verneigen oder ihn besiegen, um einen alten Schatz zu erhalten, in dem der Große Dämon eingeschlossen ist. Die Entscheidung liegt {mf|beim Freihändler|bei der Freihändlerin}.
languages.original_text: The champion of Chaos can bow to the Edge of Daybreak, or defeat it to obtain an ancient treasure in which the Greater Daemon will be sealed. The choice is up to the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Der Champion des Chaos kann sich vor dem Rand des Tagesanbruchs verneigen oder ihn besiegen, um einen alten Schatz zu erhalten, in dem der Große Dämon eingeschlossen ist. Die Entscheidung liegt {mf|beim Freihändler|bei der Freihändlerin}.

languages.text: {mf|Le champion|La championne} du Chaos peut prêter allégeance à la Lame de l'Aube ou l'éliminer pour obtenir un trésor ancestral au sein duquel le démon majeur sera emprisonné. La décision est entre les mains {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: The champion of Chaos can bow to the Edge of Daybreak, or defeat it to obtain an ancient treasure in which the Greater Daemon will be sealed. The choice is up to the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le champion|La championne} du Chaos peut prêter allégeance à la Lame de l'Aube ou l'éliminer pour obtenir un trésor ancestral au sein duquel le démon majeur sera emprisonné. La décision est entre les mains {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} campe{mf|ón|ona} del Caos puede inclinarse ante el Filo del Amanecer o derrotarlo para obtener un tesoro antiguo que sellará al daemon mayor. La decisión depende de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: The champion of Chaos can bow to the Edge of Daybreak, or defeat it to obtain an ancient treasure in which the Greater Daemon will be sealed. The choice is up to the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} campe{mf|ón|ona} del Caos puede inclinarse ante el Filo del Amanecer o derrotarlo para obtener un tesoro antiguo que sellará al daemon mayor. La decisión depende de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: 混沌的神选者可以臣服于破晓锋刃，也可以击败这位高阶恶魔，获得某件古老的宝藏。选择权在行商浪人手中。
languages.original_text: The champion of Chaos can bow to the Edge of Daybreak, or defeat it to obtain an ancient treasure in which the Greater Daemon will be sealed. The choice is up to the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 混沌的神选者可以臣服于破晓锋刃，也可以击败这位高阶恶魔，获得某件古老的宝藏。选择权在行商浪人手中。

languages.text: 渾沌の王者は、暁の刃に膝を折るか、暁の刃を倒してグレーターディーモンが封印された古代の宝を手にするかを選べる。どうするかは自由開拓者次第だ。
languages.original_text: The champion of Chaos can bow to the Edge of Daybreak, or defeat it to obtain an ancient treasure in which the Greater Daemon will be sealed. The choice is up to the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 渾沌の王者は、暁の刃に膝を折るか、暁の刃を倒してグレーターディーモンが封印された古代の宝を手にするかを選べる。どうするかは自由開拓者次第だ。

languages.text: Kaos müdafisi, Tan Vakti'ne boyun eğebilir veya içine Büyük İblis'in kapatılacağı kadim bir hazineyi elde etmek için onu alt edebilir. Seçim Hür Tacir'e ait.
languages.original_text: The champion of Chaos can bow to the Edge of Daybreak, or defeat it to obtain an ancient treasure in which the Greater Daemon will be sealed. The choice is up to the Rogue Trader.
